programme.title: The Legend of Bhagat Singh
programme.desc: During the British Raj, upon witnessing the atrocities of the British, Bhagat Singh grows up to be a fierce freedom fighter. His publicised ideas of revolution bring him to as much popularity as Mahatma Gandhi amongst Indians.

programme.title: Daata
programme.desc: Kundan loses his father and sister to the unjust and inhuman practice of dowry. Seeking revenge, he commits a murder, and his life spirals downwards from then on.

programme.title: Vishwanath
programme.desc: Vishwanath, a righteous public prosecutor, is framed and imprisoned for a crime he did not commit. Upon his release, he seeks revenge, even if it means having to break the very laws that he once defended and upheld.

programme.title: Soldier
programme.desc: Army Major Vijay Malhotra gets murdered by the mafia and is falsely declared a traitor by his corrupt colleagues. To avenge his death and clear his name, his son Vicky grows up to be a soldier and vows to set things right at any cost.

programme.title: Golmaal Returns
programme.desc: Gopalâ€™s life hits choppy waters when he gets stuck on a yacht for a night upon rescuing an attractive young woman by fighting off some goons. Now, he has his wife suspecting him of having an affair and a police officer on his tail.

programme.title: Khakee
programme.desc: DCP Anant and his team are assigned to escort an alleged terrorist from Chandangarh to Mumbai. His seemingly simple mission turns into a deadly encounter of survival when a rogue ex-cop turned criminal hinders his way.
